description:
Meditation is not hard, it only requires you to give it a go, The You can meditate today courses are designed to show you how you can give it a go and incorporate it into your daily life. You will experience a variety of Meditations ranging from short 5 minute Meditations that you can practice any where and any day for a quick pick me up – to longer meditations where you can go deeper and just enjoy the experience.

What You Will Learn:
  • Interesting Facts about Meditation
  • The Benefits of Meditation (in further detail)
  • Different Styles of Meditation
  • How you can make Meditation a Lifestyle.
  • The difference between Relaxation and Meditation
  • The relationship of Meditation with your Mind, body and Spirit
  • The Negative Effects of stress
  • Some helpful tips for managing stress.

What you will learn

• Session One: Meditation Foundations
• Leave your concerns Meditation
• Abdominal Breathing Meditation

• Session Two: The Benefits of Meditation
• Mindfulness Meditation
• Guided Meditation

• Session Three: Setting Up For Meditation
• Mantra Meditation
• Problem Solving Meditation

• Session Four: Group Meditation
• Japa Meditation
• 1 to 4 Mini Meditation

• Session Five: Turning Everyday activities into a Meditation
• Thankfulness Meditation
• Creativeness Meditation • Abundance Meditation

Free Downloads included

  • Learn To Meditate Manual
  • Meditation Music MP3

What others have said

Very good insights into the process and art of meditation. - Simon Micallef
Good practical skills and insights into how to manage a busy life – Thank You. - Andrew
I feel more relaxed then when I first came here. The meditation course gave me the tools to use each day to help with daily stress. Look forward to applying these tools. - Christine Micallef
Very practical and applies to everyday life. I can see how disciplined practice can lead to a more balanced life. - Georgina Sarkis
Centering and grounding tools controlling breath – beautiful passionate people. Enjoyed – Thank You. - Linda Usope
The practice of meditation is a great gift to give yourself. - Meena Holzhauser
I enjoyed the different types of meditation and hope to apply it in my daily life. - David Khuat
A greater understanding of the mind’s unlimited potential. And lots of calm. – Thank You! - Kris Franken
I learnt how to focus my mind, I look forward to using the techniques I learnt in my daily life. - Elise Bailey
An inspiring but peaceful and de-stressing good balance of practical (doing meditations) and learning about the meditations. The best intro course I have attended, as covers many different styles. Excellent Day. – Thank You! - Bernadette Dimitrov
I’ve been given the tools and introduction to various styles of meditation to develop a style suited to me. - Katie Hartley
Very informative – Thank You! - Brooke Mieluk
title: Learn How To Meditate
